name: user
description:
A Zoom account can have one or more users. Use this API to view information of a specific user on a Zoom account.

**Scopes:** `user:read:admin` `user:read`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

Note: If a user's status is pending, only `id` and `created_at` fields will be returned. The value of `created_at` will be the time at which the API call was made until the user activates their account.

userId.description: The user ID or email address of the user. For user-level apps, pass `me` as the value for userId.

$block: The user object represents a specific user on Zoom.

$ul: **created_at**: The date and time at which this user was created.
**timezone**: The time zone of the user.

**type**: User's plan type:
`1` - Basic.
`2` - Licensed.
`3` - On-prem.
`99` - None (this can only be set with `ssoCreate`).
**use_pmi**: Displays `true` if user has enabled PMI for instant meetinsgs, `false` otherwise. (default: false)
**cms_user_id**: CMS ID of user, only enabled for Kaltura integration.
**custom_attributes**: Custom attribute(s) that have been assigned to the user.
**group_ids**: IDs of the web groups user belongs to.
**im_group_ids**: IM IDs of the groups user belongs to.
**language**: Default language for the Zoom Web Portal.

**phone_country**: **Note:** This field has been **deprecated** and will not be supported in the future. Use the **phone_numbers** field instead of this field.
User's country for Company Phone Number.

**phone_number**: **Note:** This field has been **deprecated** and will not be supported in the future. Use the **phone_numbers** field instead of this field.
User's phone number.
**code**: Country code of the phone number. For example, for United States phone numbers, the value of this field should be "+1".

**country**: [Country ID](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/other-references/abbreviation-lists#countries) of the phone number. For example, if the phone number provided in the `number` field is a Brazil based number, the value of the `country` field should be `BR`.
**verified**: Indicates whether the phone number has been verified by Zoom or not.
**pic_url**: The URL for user's profile picture.
**plan_united_type**: United plan [type](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/other-references/plans#zoom-united-plans). Only returned if user is enrolled in the Zoom United plan.
**role_id**: Unique identifier of the [role](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/zoom-api/roles/roles) assigned to the user.
**vanity_url**: Personal meeting room URL, if the user has one.
**verified**: Displays whether user is verified or not.
